translation_en: By the sun and its brightness
translation_id: Demi matahari dan sinarnya pada waktu duha (ketika matahari naik sepenggalah),

translation_en: And [by] the moon when it follows it
And [by] the day when it displays it
And [by] the night when it covers it
And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
And [by] the earth and He who spread it
And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
translation_id: lalu Dia mengilhamkan kepadanya (jalan) kejahatan dan ketakwaannya,

translation_en: He has succeeded who purifies it,
translation_id: sungguh beruntung orang yang menyucikannya (jiwa itu)

translation_en: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
translation_id: dan sungguh rugi orang yang mengotorinya.

translation_en: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
translation_id: (Kaum) Samud telah mendustakan (rasulnya) karena mereka melampaui batas

translation_en: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
translation_id: ketika orang yang paling celaka di antara mereka bangkit (untuk menyembelih unta betina Allah).

arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُوْلُ اللّٰهِ نَاقَةَ اللّٰهِ وَسُقْيٰهَاۗ
transliteration_en: Faqaala lahum Rasoolul laahi naaqatal laahi wa suqiyaahaa
transliteration_id: Fa qāla lahum rasūlullāhi nāqatallāhi wa suqyāhā.
translation_en: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
translation_id: Rasul Allah (Saleh) lalu berkata kepada mereka, “(Biarkanlah) unta betina Allah ini beserta minumannya.”

arabic: فَكَذَّبُوْهُ فَعَقَرُوْهَاۖ فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ بِذَنْۢبِهِمْ فَسَوّٰىهَاۖ
transliteration_en: Fakazzaboohu fa'aqaroohaa fadamdama 'alaihim Rabbuhum bizambihim fasaw waahaa
transliteration_id: Fa każżabūhu fa ‘aqarūhā fa damdama ‘alaihim rabbuhum biżambihim fa sawwāhā.
translation_en: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
translation_id: Namun, mereka kemudian mendustakannya (Saleh) dan menyembelih (unta betina) itu. Maka, Tuhan membinasakan mereka karena dosa-dosanya, lalu meratakan mereka (dengan tanah).

translation_en: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
